name: Quarter Circle Forward PUNCH!
description:
A Slay The Spire mod, inspired mostly by SF2's main characters (also other fighting games). 
 
Currently it adds 22 relics, 8 custom game modifiers, 1 event and 1 potion. 
 
v1.0 will have 32+ relics. 
 
Most of the images in this mod are temporary and will be substituted/improved on v1.0.
credits:
Original creators of original CC BY 3.0 (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/) images that 
were then modified by myself for the mod: 
 
Lorc (http://lorcblog.blogspot.com/) - Basis of Duffel Bag, Fighting Gloves, White Boots and Handcuffs. 
 
Delapouite (http://delapouite.com/) - Basis of Red Headband.
 
All images above came from http://game-icons.net. 
 
Big thanks for all people who helped with testing, suggestions, ideas and criticism! More detailed thanks at https://github.com/Clauvin/Quarter_Circle_Forward_PUNCH_Mod
